title: Brand New! 1 bed + den ~no fee~
posting_body: ['Brand New West Roxbury luxury apartment!', 'Available anytime between now and September 1st.', 'NO BROKER FEE!', '- Hard surface flooring throughout', '- Modern kitchen with Quartz counters and energy-efficient appliances', '- Kitchen island in select units', '- Floor-to-ceiling windows', '- In-unit laundry', '- Spacious closets', '- Soaking tubs', 'Rent includes all the great amenities: Fitness Center ~ Motion Studio ~ Entertainment Lounge with Fireplace ~ Coffee Bar Cafe ~ Resort Style Pool ~ Outdoor Patio and Grills ~ Private Landscaped Courtyard Gardens ~ Dog Park and Pet Spa ~ Covered Bike Storage ~ Bike Repair Station ~ Electric Car Charging Station ~ Secured Controlled Building Access ~ 24-Hour Maintenance ~ Professional On-Site Management', 'PARKING: $100/month/space indoor garage', 'PETS: $50/month/pet.', '2 pet max.', '100lb max weight for dogs and breed restrictions apply', 'UTILITIES:', 'Resident pays all utilities except trash removal', "Rent through me and developer pays the full broker's fee.", 'Only $99 security deposit with approved credit.', "No last month's rent due up front.", 'Contact Dave from Hartley Realty Group for more information', '*Pictures are of model unit.', 'Furnishings not included.', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change', 'Contact Dave from Hartley Realty Group for a showing today!', '________________________________________________________', 'Not the right fit?', 'Give me a call, anyway!', 'I have knowledge of every luxury rental building in the greater Boston area, and also have access to hundreds of individually owned condos/apartments for rent!', '*********', 'I have listings that are convenient to: Boston, Back Bay, Bay Village, Beacon Hill, The Fenway, Kenmore, Longwood (BIDMC, BCH, DFCI, BW, SRH) Boston Common, Theater District, Financial District, North End, Waterfront, Seaport District, Fort Point, South Boston, South End, West End, MGH, BMC, Chinatown, Leather District, Allston, Brighton, Charlestown, Cambridge, Kendall, MIT, Central Square, Inman Square, Porter Square, Davis Square, Lechmere, Cambridgeside Galleria, Harvard Square, Fresh Pond, Alewife, North Cambridge, Dorchester, Quincy, East Boston, Medford, Somerville, Brookline, Chestnut Hill, Watertown, Waltham, Newton, Red Line, Orange Line, Green Line, Silver Line, Blue Line.']
